channel.title: [317] Banning local host
channel.description:
Well, when i try to connect, like 2 times maximum, this happens.
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2u7naso.png[/img]
any ideas on how to fix it?

item.title: [317] Banning local host
item.dc:creator: @Sideways_8 Sideways_8
item.description:
@Sideways_8 wrote:

Well, seeing as its the 2speced base, I’m guessing its 317 or 503? And either your client isn’t connecting properly so it’s auto-reconnecting and the server reads it as flooding? Or, theirs a server-side anti-leech, try looking through your server files using a byte searcher or z-file searcher for 127.0.0.1 and look for anything that would add that IP to the ban list.

Read full topic
